t: Amazon faces union vote at North Carolina warehouse | Reuters
s: February 10, 2025 - Amazon is facing its second workers’ union vote in as many months as laborers at a warehouse in suburban Raleigh, North Carolina, decide this week whether they wish to collectively bargain with the retail giant.

t: Kannapolis Welcomes Amazon (Second Location & 100 Jobs in City Announced)
s: Kannapolis welcomes Amazon to their second location in the City. Amazon will open the additional site, in the 85 Exchange Industrial Park, at 6255 Shumard Street, near their distribution center, which is located at the intersection of Kannapolis Parkway and N.C. 73.
